title: The Gary Null Show
content:
Latest updates on health and nutrition, plus commentaries on environmental and political issues. <!--more--> Plus: Dental hygiene and natural treatments for oral health  Dr Leslie Alexander is a professional herbalist and co-owner of Restoration Herbs in Franklin Pennsylvania, specializing in natural dental health.  She has degrees in the environmental sciences and received her doctorate in biological sciences from Heriot-Watt University in Edinburgh Scotland.
  She serves on the council of the American HerbalistGuild and is a member of the American Academy of Oral Systemic health and the American Botanical Council.
She is the co-author of a recent and very comprehensive reference guide to natural oral health entitled “Dental Herbalism:  Natural Therapies for the Mouth”.  Her website is DentalHerbalism.com
